#Text=Lanzhou
#Text=Lanzhou ( 兰州 ; Lánzhōu ) is the capital of Gansu province of China .
#Text=Understand
#Text=Lanzhou is an industrial city of about three million people .
#Text=It is located on the shores of the Yellow River and was a major stop on the Silk Road ; in those days , it was known as the Golden City .
#Text=From the 5th to the 11th century the city was a major seat of Buddhist learning , and it acquired its present name during the Qing Dynasty in 1656 .
#Text=Until the 19th century , Lanzhou was the primary point for crossing the Yellow River via a bridge made by chaining a flotilla of boats together with a road on top to cross on .
#Text=Lanzhou used to be one of the most polluted cities in China but the situation has improved .
#Text=By plane
#Text=Lanzhou Zhongchuan International Airport ( LHW ) ( is situated 75km from the city centre of Lanzhou ) .

#Text=Daily flights to Beijing , Changsha , Chengdu , Chongqing , Dunhuang , Fuzhou , Guangzhou , Haikou , Hangzhou , Jiayuguan , Kunming , Nanjing , Qingdao , Shanghai , Shenyang , Shenzhen , Ürümqi , Wenzhou , Wuhan , Xiamen , Xi'an and Zhengzhou .
#Text=By train
#Text=All long-distance trains nowadays use , a huge modern building that from the street looks like a gigantic Walmart .
#Text=From here , high-speed trains rush to Xining ( 1 h 15 min ) , Jiayuguan ( 4 h 30 min ) , Urumqi ( 12 h ) , Xian ( 4 h ) , Wuhan and Beijing .
#Text=Conventional trains still use the old Lanzhou Railway Station ( Lanzhou Huoche Zhan ) at the south end of Pingliang Lu at Tianshui Lu .
#Text=This is also served by a few high-speed trains , and by the airport train .
#Text=By bus
#Text=The East Long-Distance Bus Station is on Pingliang Lu .
#Text=Destinations include Dunhuang ( 24 hours ) , Guyuan ( 8 ) , Jiayuguan ( 17 ) , Pingliang ( 5 ) , Tianshui ( 4 ) , Urumqi ( 38 ) , Xi'an ( 15 ) , Yinchuan ( 12 ) and Zhangye ( 12 ) .
#Text=The West Long-Distance Bus Station is on Xijin Xilu .
#Text=Destinations include Linxia ( 3 hours ) , Liujiaxia ( 2 ) , Xining ( 5 ) and Hezuo ( 5 ) .
#Text=The South Long-Distance Bus Station serves Xiahe ( 6 hours ) .
#Text=Get around
#Text=The Metro runs east-west across the city , linking downtown with West Railway Station .
#Text=The #1 Bus is really useful getting around Lanzhou .
#Text=It travels from Lanzhou Station to the Lanzhou Hotel , Qingyang Lu , Xihu Gongyuian Park , Qiliheqiao and ending at Lanzhou West Station .
#Text=It also connects the train station to the starting point of the shuttle bus to the airport , here .
#Text=There 's a city bike scheme , with pick-up / drop-off stations dotted around .
#Text=See
#Text=Gansu Provincial Museum ( 甘肃省博物馆 ) , XiJin Dong Lu ( Take bus 1 , 18 , 31 , 50 , 53 , 58 , 59 , 71 and get off at Qilihe Qiao Station . ) .
#Text=Tu - Su 09:00-17:00. Silk Road history in one place .
#Text=The museum is divided into two sections , natural resources and historic exhibits .
#Text=It houses collections of various colour-painted potteries of Neolithic Age and treasures of ancient grottoes .
#Text=It 's also home to precious linen and silk fabrics , books , wooden and bronze vessels , bamboo writing-slips from the Han Dynasty ( 206 BC-220 ) , frescoes and many other items .
#Text=The 4-meter high Mammoth is a replica of one excavated from the Yellow River basin in 1973 .
#Text=There are also exhibits of rare modern animals , such as pandas , golden monkeys and red-crowned cranes .
#Text=The iconic exhibit is the Galloping Horse , excavated in 1969 in Wuwei County , Gansu Province .
#Text=A horse gallops with long tail waving and head perking ; three hooves are in the air , while the right hind hoof has alighted on the back of a small flying swallow .
#Text=Bird and horse turn in surprise to try to see what 's happening .
#Text=A small replica from the gift shop is Y500 .
#Text=Free , but you need your passport to enter .
#Text=Green Corridor along Binhe Road .
#Text=( 滨河路绿色长廊 )
#Text=Five-Spring Mountain ( Wuquanshan Gongyuan ) .
#Text=( 五泉山 ) A jumble of a poor amusement park and some renovated temples .
#Text=Zhongshan ( " Morning " ) Bridge ( Zhongshan Qiao , 中山桥 ) , Zhongshan Lu ( Intersection of Nanbinhe Dong Lu & Zhongshan Lu ) .
#Text=Always open .
#Text=With a name like that , it ought to be a scenic arch on a willow-pattern plate .
#Text=It 's actually a sturdy metal trellis , which it needs to be to withstand the surging , foaming Yellow River , and it 's far from pretty .
#Text=When completed in 1909 , it was the first permanent bridge across the river .
#Text=Pedestrian only nowadays , it 's the natural route to and viewpoint for White Pagoda Mountain .
#Text=White Pagoda Mountain ( Baitashan 白塔山 ) . Park
#Text=ranging over the wooded hillside north of the river , dotted with pagodas and shrines .
#Text=Enter next to Zhongshan Bridge and wander uphill by any path , eventually to the White Pagoda Temple .
#Text=( There 's also a cable-car from south bank of the river . )
#Text=Refurbished in 2013 yet the buildings look well-worn , several boarded-up ; the " Jade Temple " compound is in the best condition .
#Text=Free .
#Text=White Cloud Temple ( Baiyun Taoist Temple ) is on the south river bank , Nanbinhe East Road , one block west of Zhongshan Bridge .
#Text=It 's much less touristy , a peaceful little compound , so the wear-and-tear on the buildings feels venerable rather than run-down .
#Text=Free .
#Text=Qiaomen Mosque ( Bridge Gate Mosque , 桥门清真寺 ) is just south of the bridge .
#Text=Xiguan Mosque is on Cuiyingmen , one block south of the Taoist Temple .
#Text=Anywhere else , this would be a hard-hat zone , as ( in 2018 ) the mosque compound is being rebuilt .
#Text=But if you pick your way past blocks of cladding and piles of sand and trailing pipes and cables , the mosque itself remains open .
#Text=It 's quite a simple modern design .
#Text=Waterwheel Garden , Nanbinhe Dong Lu .
#Text=( 水车博览园 )
#Text=Small park along the Yellow River housing impressive traditional waterwheels , originally used to irrigate farmland around Lanzhou .
#Text=Free .
#Text=Sculptures of the Mother River .
#Text=( 黄河母亲像)Gansu sculpture by the famous sculptor He E creation,6 meters long,2.2 meters wide,2.6 meters tall , weighing 40 tons , from " mother " and a " baby " of composition .
#Text=Gaolan Mountain . ( 皋兰山 )
#Text=Cool place to be when the summer heat kicks in .
#Text=Qiaomen Mosque .
#Text=( 桥门清真寺 )
#Text=Tianfusha Palace . ( 天斧沙宫 )
#Text=Bingling Si .
#Text=( 炳灵寺石窟 )
#Text=Cave grottoes and a boat ride , all in one trip .
#Text=Yantan Park ( 雁滩公园 ) .
#Text=Since founding a state , here has built up to 20 km ring at the dam and 10 km asphalt road , and across the Yellow River tributary , the Yantan and urban integration .
#Text=Later turned into parks , gardens
#Text=lush forests , beautiful scenery , has built a pavilion , and the Yellow River scenery mutual authentic , very magnificent .
#Text=Solemn Temple ( 庄严寺 ) .
#Text=The great cause of thirteen years ( 617 years ) , Xue Ju in Lanzhou later became the emperor , the solemn temple as the palace .
#Text=Tang Pingdingxue cited later renamed the temple , by the gate , and QianDian rooms , the main hall , houdian constitute HHS falls .

#Text=six characters , is the famous calligrapher Li Puguang the book , font bold .
#Text=The main hall after a Buddhism godness Guanyin wall murals , dignified and beautiful , wearing white , wanran such as yarn , Panicum Jingping , Cuise such as the new .
